item.name: User Auth Routes

header.value: accessToken=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI2ODMwYjM3MTYyYTIwYTkxN2JkN2Q0NmUiLCJlbWFpbCI6InRlc3QxMUBnbWFpbC5jb20iLCJ1c2VybmFtZSI6InRlc3QxMSIsImlhdCI6MTc0ODIzOTUxMywiZXhwIjoxNzQ4ODM5NTEzfQ.3YdLiCrYBGQxWlFWapM7AZ2nlsi1uJrzrCHV8Ed0PSM; Max-Age=86400; Path=/; Expires=Tue, 27 May 2025 06:05:13 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure

item.description:
# Saves all the authentication routes: /api/v1/users | **Route** | **Request Type** | **Goal** | **Data Accepted** | **Response** | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | /register | POST | Register a new user | username
email
password | Send mail to user for emailVerification and register user. | | /verifyMail/:token | GET | Verify entered email | \- | | | /login | POST | Login a verified user | email/username
password | Add 2 tokens in cookies: access + refresh token | | /changePassword | POST | Change old password to new | username/email
oldPassword
newPassword | | | /resendVerificationEmail | POST | Send email to user with new verifyEmail token | email/username
password | | | /forgotPassword | POST | Send mail (to verify user mail) to user to reset password | email/username | Send mail to user with reset password link | | /resetPassword/:token | POST | Save new password to db | newPassword | | | /getProfile | GET | if user is loggedIn | \- | | | /logout | GET | Remove refresh and access token | \- | | | /refreshAccessToken | GET | Get new access Token from refresh token | \- | new access token | | /updateProfile | POST | Update avatarUrl/ name of user | avatar/name | |

item.description:
All routes works on a specific projects:

[http://localhost:3000/api/v1/users/login](http://localhost:3000/api/v1/users/login)

{ "email": "[test11@gmail.com](https://mailto:test11@gmail.com)", "password": "1234567" }

---

[http://localhost:3000/project/createProject](http://localhost:3000/project/createProject)

{

"name": "Full Stack Project",

"description": "This is a dream, but it's okay, let's take it one at a time."

}

Response gives projectID: 683d5597454d27834578db1b

---

[http://localhost:3000/project/683d5597454d27834578db1b/addMember](http://localhost:3000/project/683d5597454d27834578db1b/addMember)

{ "userID": "683079ff32aa7de40a84ab7a"}: test2, test3, test17 (as project_admin)

---

created some notes with content

item.description:
user should be logged in and has access to the project, before accessing this route
/*
--------Tasks---------
createTask: anyone
updateTask: (title, desc, attachments) only creater can + admin + project_admin
deleteTask: only creater access + admin + project_admin
updateTaskStatus: jisko assign kiya gya h vhi update kr skta h + admin + project_admin
getTasks: admin and project admin can see all tasks, 
getAssignedTasks: all can see their assigned tasks
getCreatedTasks: all can see their assignedBy tasks
*/

item.description:
one should be logged in -> has access to the project -> has access to view the task

Each such user can see the subtask.

But, a creater can only update, delete the subtask.
